Player History
Injured on 9/3/1982 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/26/1984 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/7/1984 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 5/10/1985...
Had first career hit on 5/19/1985, off Dean Hirt (CBC)...
Traded from Bay City to Gashouse on 7/26/1987 (Going to GHG: P T. Prahl, C W. Prindle. Going to BC: P W. Smith)...
Traded from Gashouse to Halifax on 4/19/1988 (Going to GHG: 2B P. Ibañez. Going to HAL: P T. Prahl, P K. Sims, C W. Prindle)...
Injured on 6/12/1990 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/15/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $2,543,700 per year...
